trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ServiceNameCollection"></xref> class is a read-only collection of service principal names.

The <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ServiceNameCollection> class is used in an <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy> when validating against a custom list of service provider names (SPNs).

Initializes a new read-only instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ServiceNameCollection"></xref> class based on an existing <xref href="System.Collections.ICollection"></xref>.
The <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ServiceNameCollection> class that is initialized contains the specified values passed in the `items` parameter.
An instance of the <xref href="System.Collections.ICollection"></xref> class that contains the specified values of service names to be used to initialize the class.
item is `null`.
item is empty.
Returns a value indicating whether the specified string occurs within this <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ServiceNameCollection"></xref> instance.
The string to seek.
Returns <xref href="System.Boolean"></xref>.
`true` if the searchServiceName parameter occurs within this instance; otherwise, `false`.

Merges the current <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ServiceNameCollection"></xref> with the specified values to create a new <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ServiceNameCollection"></xref> containing the union.
The <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ServiceNameCollection> class that is initialized contains the specified values passed in the `items` parameter.
An instance of the <xref href="System.Collections.IEnumerable"></xref> class that contains the specified values of service names to be merged.

A new <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ServiceNameCollection"></xref> instance that contains the union of the existing <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ServiceNameCollection"></xref> instance merged with the specified values.
serviceNames is `null`.
serviceNames is empty.

Merges the current <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ServiceNameCollection"></xref> with the specified values to create a new <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ServiceNameCollection"></xref> containing the union.
The <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ServiceNameCollection> class that is initialized contains the specified values passed in the `items` parameter.
A string that contains the specified values of service names to be used to initialize the class.

A new <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ServiceNameCollection"></xref> instance that contains the union of the existing <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ServiceNameCollection"></xref> instance merged with the specified values.
serviceNames is `null`.
serviceNames is empty.
